articles.title: YAMIBO: Darkness, the Hat, and Travelers of the Books - Episode 9 - Meilin
articles.description: A charged-up Hazuki rescues Princess Fuji. Meilin gets summoned to Gargantua's dimension because he thought she had the comb. In flashback, Lilith accepts Mariel’s soul from Gargantua in exchange for a world of his own.

articles.title: YAMIBO: Darkness, the Hat, and Travelers of the Books - Episode 7 - Hatsumi
articles.description: Milka is saved by her white tiger. Arya reveals that Seiren was a demoness spawned by Lilith and that Seiren is only interested in harnessing Milka's power. A long flashback shows Hazuki and Hatsumi's life before the latter's disappearance.

articles.title: YAMIBO: Darkness, the Hat, and Travelers of the Books - Episode 4 - Mariel
articles.description: Ritsuko is serving the Princess Mariel. Mariel falls for the charms of Gargantua, now an alchemist. His attempt to sacrifice her is foiled by Ritsuko, but the princess is rendered half-demon and takes her own life.

articles.title: YAMIBO: Darkness, the Hat, and Travelers of the Books - Episode 6 - Milka
articles.description: Hazuki and Lilith arrive on an island and meet a young girl, Milka, her white tiger, and the demoness Seiren. Milka does not age and suffers from "mindquakes" related to the Great Library.

articles.title: YAMIBO: Darkness, the Hat, and Travelers of the Books - Episode 2 - Yōko
articles.description: On board the train, Yōko confronts the Colonel and is sheltered by the Siberian Tiger. In the ensuing mêlée, they are confronted at gun point by undercover spies. Yōko recovers from a battle on the train and the trio bonds.

articles.title: YAMIBO: Darkness, the Hat, and Travelers of the Books - Episode 13 - Lilith
articles.description: Lilith lashes out at Eve for abandoning her for what seems to be tens of thousands of years and Eve tries to make it up to her. Lilith notices that Eve misses Hazuki, who seems not to have returned to the correct book-world.

articles.title: YAMIBO: Darkness, the Hat, and Travelers of the Books - Episode 11 - Tamamonomae
articles.description: With Lilith’s help, the ship warps within reach of a suitable planet. The children land on the planet with the DNA samples of Earth's animals.

articles.title: YAMIBO: Darkness, the Hat, and Travelers of the Books - Episode 10 - Layla
articles.description: Lilith and Hazuki arrive aboard a colonization spaceship where a computer is caring for a whole cohort of children. A habitable planet must be found soon for the survival of the children.

articles.title: YAMIBO: Darkness, the Hat, and Travelers of the Books - Episode 8 - Fujihime
articles.description: Hazuki saves a fox spirit, Meilin, from a band of samurai in a feudal Japanese world. She encounters Princess Fuji, who looks identical to Hatsumi except that she speaks. Ninjas intent on gaining Princess Fuji's mysterious power attack the mansion.

articles.title: YAMIBO: Darkness, the Hat, and Travelers of the Books - Episode 5 - Quill
articles.description: Hazuki and Lilith reach a prehistoric world. Lilith is mistaken for a god. A cavegirl named Quill develops an attachment to Hazuki, offering herself up as a sacrifice. The real god appears but is defeated by Hazuki. The search is another dead end.

articles.title: YAMIBO: Darkness, the Hat, and Travelers of the Books - Episode 1 - Hazuki
articles.description: Hatsumi Azuma disappears on the morning of her 16th birthday. Along with a feathered companion and a keeper of the Great Library named Lilith, Hatsumi’s adopted sister, Hazuki, goes world-hopping in search of her.

articles.title: YAMIBO: Darkness, the Hat, and Travelers of the Books - Episode 3 - Jill
articles.description: Hazuki meets Lilith and learns that she herself possesses the essence of the protector of the Great Library. Hazuki accepts Lilith's help traveling the worlds and Hazuki, Ken-chan and Lilith set off in search of the missing sister.

articles.title: YAMIBO: Darkness, the Hat, and Travelers of the Books - Episode 12 - Gargantua
articles.description: Gargantua, Hazuki and Lilith all argue over Jill/Hatsumi/Eve, who stops their bickering. She then tries to set things right. Gargantua finally realizes that it is Ritsuko that he loves.
